attributes.action: Reduce the tax on all petrol so that the cost is no more than 60p per litre to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please could the government reduce the tax on petrol so that the cost to the public is 60p per litre and not over £1 per litre as it is now.
The cost of goods and services to all is bankrupting the country.
Please listen to the public and act now.

government_responses.details:
